Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small Lattice Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Lattice AllSmallLattice is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic lattice models from orders 2 to 9.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of Lattice formulas(Lattice).
x+y = y+x & x*y=y*x.
(x+y)+z = x+(y+z) & (x*y)*z = x*(y*z).
x*(x+y)=x & x+(x*y)=x.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
